data.name: Magda Cafe
data.description: A very relaxed cafe with some nice sandwiches, salads, grilled food and more.

menu_categories.name: Best Sellers
menu_categories.description: Here are some favourite dishes from our customers

products.name: Chicken avocado mayo sandwich
products.description: Foccacian Bread filled with grilled diced chicken cubes, avocado, mayonnaise, tomato and melted cheese

products.name: Curry chicken cheese burger
products.description: Marinated Cajun chicken breast topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato and onion

products.name: Hot chicken pesto sandwich
products.description: Grilled diced chicken in a basil pesto sauce ans melted cheese. Served on foccacian bread

products.name: Grilled cheese burger
products.description: Boiled beef burger layered with cheese, lettuce, tomato, fresh white sliced onion and drizzled with homemade gravy

products.name: Beef stroganoff
products.description: Grilled peppers, mushrooms, onions, and beef strips. served with basmati rice

products.name: Fish fingers
products.description: Deep fried strips of fish, bread crambed and served with french fries, tartan sauce and sliced lemon

products.name: Turmeric grilled chicken salad
products.description: Strips of grilled chicken, avocado, tomatoes,cucumber, topped with cheese, roasted cashew nuts grilled banana, served with creamy Dijon dressing

products.name: Two fried eggs, tomatoes, baked beans, mushroom and two slices of toasted bread

products.description: Chicken/ Fish/ Beef and vegetable in curry sauce served with French fries or basmati rice
